description: Unique surrogate key for this contact–shift assignment record.
Identifier of the assigned work shift; likely a foreign key to the shift catalog/schedule.
Identifier of the employee/contact to whom the shift applies; foreign key to the contacts table.
Boolean flag indicating this is the contact’s primary/default shift.
Optional additional hourly premium rate for this assignment (e.g., shift differential); likely a currency field; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the contact–shift assignment.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated modification; appears redundant with last_modified—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified by a user.
